tagline: Models the financial future so leadership can make better bets with clearer information
pros: Three-statement financial models that are transparent and auditable
Scenario analysis that quantifies the cost of being wrong
Unit economics tracking that catches margin erosion early
Cash flow forecasting that prevents runway surprises
cons: Models require clean data — garbage in, garbage out
Financial projections are always uncertain — false precision is a risk
Strategic context needed to interpret numbers meaningfully

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
